original_text:
Moonlight Fortune 50
Una donna guerriera dedita al culto della luna è la protagonista di Moonlight Fortune 50, la slot targata Synot con una vincita potenziale di 250.000 €!
Tema e grafica
In questa bella slot di casa Synot faremo un bellissimo viaggio in compagnia di una bellissima guerriera e di creature della notte come gufi, lepri, lupi, ma anche unicorni.
La cosa che si nota subito è che in Moonlight Fortune 50 c’è una fusione tra mitologia nordica e occidentale: la guerriera ricorda la figura di Artemide, dea della caccia, della selvaggina e responsabile dell’iniziazione femminile al culto della luna, ma allo stesso tempo ha orecchie a punta tipiche degli elfi e una lunga spada che pare di origine vichinga.
Comunque sia, siamo di fronte a un gioco molto ben fatto. La grafica è ottima come sempre, i simboli sono ben disegnati e ricchi di dettagli, come ad esempio le radici che formano le lettere delle carte da gioco o le foglie che cadono ai lati della griglia.
Gli spazi che accolgono i pulsanti sono ben organizzati, di modo che tutto risulti a portata di click.
La musica rilassante che fa da sottofondo alle giocate è un plus che riesce a trasmettere calma e serenità d’animo.
Com’è fatta Moonlight Fortune 50
La griglia semplice 5×4 ha 50 linee di pagamento fisse su cui costruire le nostre combo. Per vincere è necessario associare almeno 3 simboli identici adiacenti, partendo dal rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra. Prima però dobbiamo scegliere l’importo della nostra scommessa, che parte da un minimo di 0,10 € e può raggiungere i 100 €.
Con la funzione Autoplay si possono far andare i rulli per un numero prestabilito di giri compreso tra 10 e 1.000. La modalità si conclude cliccando sul tasto Stop Autoplay o quando si attivano i Giri Gratis.
Moonlight Fortune 50 ha una volatilità media e un RTP del 95,02%.
Come vincere a Moonlight Fortune 50
Vediamo ora quanto possiamo vincere con questo gioco. Partiamo col dire che in Moonlight Fortune 50 ci sono 6 simboli di basso livello rappresentati dalle carte da gioco (dal nove all’asso) e 4 simboli di alto livello che sono poi i simboli tematici: la lepre e il gufo che pagano sino a 4 volte la puntata, il lupo che invece paga 6 volte e l’unicorno che tra i simboli regolari è il più generoso, arrivando a ricompensare con una cifra pari a 8 volte la scommessa iniziale. Per avere un’idea precisa sulle somme elargite si può accedere alla tabella Payments cliccando sul tasto menù alla destra della griglia.
La ragazza è il nostro Wild, e oltre a sostituire tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter, paga sino a dieci volta la scommessa iniziale.
La luna è invece il simbolo Bonus e ne servono 3 per ottenere 6 giri gratis e un moltiplicatore x2. Durante i Free Spins, il primo e l’ultimo rullo vengono coperti da due Sticky Wild a espansione che rimangono attivi durante l’intera funzione.
È inoltre presente l’opzione Gamble che dopo ogni vincita ci consente di scommettere la somma. Accettando la sfida, si può raddoppiare la vincita ma anche perderla del tutto.

Domande Frequenti 
In cosa consiste la funzione Gamble?

È un gioco che ci consente di raddoppiare la somma vinta o di perderla interamente. Lo scopo è indovinare il colore della carta estratta dal mazzo.



Qual è la volatilità del gioco?

In questa slot la volatilità è media.



A quanto corrisponde il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP)?

Moonlight Fortune 50 ha un RTP del 95,02%.

raw_translation.response:
Moonlight Fortune 50

Moonlight Fortune 50, the Synot slot with a potential win of €250,000, features a moon-worshiping warrior woman as the protagonist.

Theme and Graphics

In this beautiful slot from Synot, we embark on a journey with a beautiful warrior and night creatures like owls, hares, wolves, and unicorns. Immediately noticeable in Moonlight Fortune 50 is the fusion of Norse and Western mythology: the warrior resembles the figure of Artemis, goddess of hunting, wild animals, and responsible for female initiation into moon worship. But at the same time, she has pointed elf ears and a long sword that appears to be of Viking origin.

However, we are facing a very well-made game. The graphics are excellent as always, with well-drawn symbols and rich in details, such as the roots forming the letters of the playing cards or the leaves falling on the sides of the grid.

Moonlight Fortune 50 Gameplay

The simple 5x4 grid has 50 fixed paylines on which to build our combinations. To win, it is necessary to match at least 3 identical adjacent symbols, starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. However, first, we must choose the amount of our bet, which starts at a minimum of €0.10 and can reach €100.

With the Autoplay feature, you can spin the reels for a pre-set number of spins ranging from 10 to 1,000. The mode is concluded by clicking on the Stop Autoplay button or when Free Spins are activated.

Moonlight Fortune 50 has medium volatility and an RTP of 95.02%.

How to Win

Let's see how much we can win with this game. Moonlight Fortune 50 has 6 low-level symbols represented by playing cards (from 9 to Ace) and 4 high-level symbols that are then the thematic symbols: the hare and owl that pay up to 4 times the bet, the wolf that pays 6 times, and the unicorn, which among the regular symbols is the most generous, reaching a reward equal to 8 times the initial bet. For a precise idea of the sums awarded, you can access the Payments table by clicking on the menu button to the right of the grid.

The girl is our Wild and, in addition to replacing all symbols except the Scatter, pays up to ten times the initial bet. The moon is instead the Bonus symbol, and three of them are needed to get 6 free spins and a 2x multiplier. During the Free Spins, the first and last reels are covered by two expanding Sticky Wilds that remain active throughout the entire function.

There is also the Gamble option that allows us to bet the sum after each win. Accepting the challenge, you can double the win but also lose it completely.

FAQ

What is the volatility of the game?

The volatility of this slot is medium.

What is the theoretical return to player (RTP)?

Moonlight Fortune 50 has an RTP of 95.02%.

Review:
 
Game Design and Theme

Moonlight Fortune 50 by Synot is a visually appealing slot game that takes players on a journey to a moonlit world with a Norse and Western Mythology theme. The character design of the fierce warrior woman is a blend of Artemis, the Greek goddess of hunting, and Viking origin that perfectly fits the game's theme. The graphics are excellent, with well-drawn symbols and details that players will appreciate. Moreover, the background music adds soothing calmness that complements the theme perfectly.

Gameplay and Features

Moonlight Fortune 50 is a simple 5x4 slot game with 50 fixed paylines that offer players multiple opportunities to build winning combos. The minimum bet is €0.10, while the maximum bet is €100. The game has medium volatility and an RTP of 95.02%. The Autoplay feature allows players to set the reels to spin automatically from 10 to 1,000 times. Moonlight Fortune 50 also has a gamble option, which doubles your winnings or makes you lose everything. The game's most exciting feature is the free spins round triggered by three Moon Bonus symbols, giving six free spins with a 2x multiplier. During free spins, the first and last reels turn into Sticky Wilds, making it easier to create winning combinations.

Paylines and Bet Limits

Moonlight Fortune 50 has a simple grid layout of 5x4 with 50 fixed paylines. The game offers a minimum bet of €0.10 and a maximum bet of €100, making it a game that caters to both casual players and high rollers. The betting limits are wide enough, providing players with multiple opportunities to create winning combos. The game's medium volatility makes it possible to win decent payouts frequently.

Symbols and Payouts

Moonlight Fortune 50 features ten symbols, including low-level and high-level symbols. The playing cards (nine to ace) represent the low-level symbols, while the thematic symbols are the rabbit, owl, wolf, and unicorn. The high-level symbols pay more than the low-level symbols. The unicorn pays the most, rewarding the player with eight times the initial bet. The girl is the game's wild symbol, replacing all symbols except the scatter and paying up to ten times the initial bet. The Moon is the game's bonus symbol and triggers the free spins round. The payout table can be accessed by clicking the menu button to the right of the grid to see the amounts paid for each symbol.

Bonus and Free Spins

Moonlight Fortune 50's free spins round is triggered by three Moon Bonus symbols, giving six free spins with a 2x multiplier. During this round, the first and last reels become expanding Sticky Wilds that remain active, increasing the chances of hitting a big win. The Sticky Wilds increase the possibilities of generating winning combinations.

Review: Moonlight Fortune 50
Moonlight Fortune 50, brought to you by Synot, features a moon-worshipping warrior woman as its main character and offers a potential win of up to €250,000!

Theme and Graphics
In this stunning slot game by Synot, players embark on a journey into the night, accompanied by a fierce warrior woman and creatures of the night like owls, rabbits, wolves, and even unicorns.

The first thing to notice about Moonlight Fortune 50 is the fusion of Norse and Western mythology, as the warrior woman reminds us of the Greek goddess of hunting, Artemis, who is responsible for the initiation of young women into the cult of the moon. At the same time, she has pointed ears characteristic of elves and a long sword that seems to be of Viking origin.

We are faced with a beautifully designed game. The graphics are superb, the symbols are well-drawn and rich in detail, like the roots forming the letters of the playing cards or the falling leaves on either side of the grid.

The spaces that accommodate the buttons are well-organized, making everything easily accessible with a simple click. The relaxing music playing in the background is a great addition that conveys calmness and serenity.

How Moonlight Fortune 50 Works
The simple 5×4 grid features 50 fixed paylines on which players can build their combos. To win, you must match at least three identical adjacent symbols, starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right. But first, you must choose the amount of your bet, which starts from a minimum of €0.10 and can go up to €100.

With the Autoplay function, you can set the reels to spin for a predetermined number of spins ranging from 10 to 1,000. The mode concludes by clicking the Stop Autoplay button or when triggering Free Spins.

Moonlight Fortune 50 has medium volatility and an RTP of 95.02%.

How to Win at Moonlight Fortune 50
Now let's see how much you can win with this game. Moonlight Fortune 50 features six low-level symbols represented by playing cards (nine to ace) and four high-level symbols that are then the thematic symbols. The rabbit and the owl pay up to four times your bet, the wolf pays six times, and the unicorn, among the regular symbols, is the most generous, rewarding you with an amount equal to eight times your initial bet. To get a precise idea of the amounts paid out, you can access the Payments table by clicking on the menu button to the right of the grid.

The girl is our Wild symbol and, in addition to replacing all symbols except the Scatter, pays up to ten times the initial bet.

The moon is the Bonus symbol, and you need three of them to get six free spins and a x2 multiplier. During Free Spins, the first and last reels are covered with two expanding Sticky Wilds that remain active throughout the entire function.

There is also the Gamble option that allows us to bet after each win. By accepting the challenge, you can double your winnings, but you could also lose everything.

Frequently Asked Questions
What is the game's volatility?
The game's volatility is medium.

What is the theoretical return to player (RTP) rate?
Moonlight Fortune 50 has an RTP of 95.02%.
